DOC.detailed_description: PROTOCOL OUTLINE : This randomize , multicenter study . Patients randomize receive cyclophosphamide IV 60 minute day -5 -2 without antithymocyte globulin IV 4 hour . All patient receive bone marrow 60-120 minute day 0 , 36 hour last dose cyclophosphamide . Patients follow day 100 , 6 month , 1 year posttransplant .
